intro.p: Converts the Indigo query molecules in one of the input table's columns into various string representations (SDF, SMILES).
This node uses Indigo classes to process structures.

fullDescription.option: The column that contains Indigo molecules.
Appends a new column (with the name as specified in the text field) if checked, replaces the original column otherwise.
Applicable only when the output format is Molfile or CML

ports.outPort: Table with the query molecules' converted string representations
